purpose: To provide a structured learning path and resources for individuals looking to master large language model (LLM) engineering
principle: Utilizes Jupyter Notebooks for interactive learning, with practical exercises and examples demonstrating LLM capabilities and techniques
reusability: Includes modular Jupyter Notebooks that can be adapted for different LLM applications and learning scenarios
limitations: Primarily focused on educational purposes; may not cover all advanced LLM use cases or industry-specific applications
name: llm_engineering
description: Repo to accompany my mastering LLM engineering course
highlight: Comprehensive guide and tools for mastering LLM engineering with practical examples and exercises
